report.name: audit_immo_P2I

reportHtmlEscapes.beforeReportHtmlEscape: <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN"> <html dir=&Direction> <head> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=&Encoding"> </head> <body bgcolor="#ffffff">

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: select to_char(cdeb,'YYYY') ANNEE, icpi PROJET, ilibel LIB_PROJET , pid PID, libdsg DEPARTEMENT, soccode SOCIETE, ident PRESTATAIRE, SUBSTR(trim(rnom),0,20) NOM, to_char(cdeb,'MM') MOIS, consojh JH, coutFT COUT , TOTALHTR TOTAL_HTR, typfact TYPE, numfact NUM_FACTURE, fMONTANTHTR MONTANT_HTR, lMONTANTHT MONTANT_HT, fsocfour FOURNISSEUR, FREGCOMPTA DATE_COMPTA, trim(NUM_EXT) NUM_EXTERNE from audit_immo where soccode != 'SG..' &p_where order by icpi, pid, ident, cdeb, consojh desc

function.name: afterpform
f_jhformattrigger
f_jhformattrigger2
f_sumjhperprojetformattrigger
b_jhformattrigger
b_coutformattrigger

report.webSource:
